com.salesforce.androidsdk.mobilesync.target

Class CollectionSyncUpTarget

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.mobilesync.target.SyncTarget
      • com.salesforce.androidsdk.mobilesync.target.SyncUpTarget
        • com.salesforce.androidsdk.mobilesync.target.BatchSyncUpTarget
          • com.salesforce.androidsdk.mobilesync.target.CollectionSyncUpTarget
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdvancedSyncUpTarget

    public class CollectionSyncUpTarget
extends BatchSyncUpTarget
    Subclass of SyncUpTarget that batches create/update/delete operations by using sobject collection apis
